name: Vf Expansion
author: vfthemes

sections.description:
This is a plugin created for Vf themes. This plugin provides additional frontpage sections for Vf Themes.

License

Vf Expansion WordPress plugin, Copyright (C) 2022 Vf Themes
Vf Expansion WordPress plugin is licensed under the GPL3 (https://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-3.0.en.html).
sections.installation:
Option 1.

  • Upload the entire vf-expansion zip file to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  • Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.

Option 2.

  • From your wp-admin —> Plugins —> Add New —> Search “Vf Expansion” —> Click install.
  • After plugin is downloaded, click active plugin
sections.faq:
How to Install Plugin ?

Just upload the vf-expansion.zip to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory, and then activate it from ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
